name: Paradise Abyss
description:
Play as our main girl, Doki, to defeat the monsters and survive as long as possible with her allies. Use the portal to collect mana or a friend on Paradise Sky or defeat her enemies on Material Ground & Abyssal Caves.

Controls:

Move: A D

Magical Beam: O or K

Jump: Spacebar

Background Art by: Sébastien LEROY, Stasis Soft, LLC & Radamés Medeiros

Sound Effects: Hit by LittleRobotSoundFactory, Jump by Antikore, & Pew by ani_music

Music by: Chad Crouch & happiness in aeroplanes

Special Thanks to Danny Dang for the backend and development of this game, Desiree Rodriguez-St Plice for being the muse and inspiration  & Gaia Hwang without whom this game would not be possible :)
